1370: Egbertus was born in Waale straet in 1370.
Got married to Aleydis at age 21 in 1370.
1373: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Pietersen, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Aleydis, Ever, at age 25.
1375: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Hersewindis, at age 26.
1377: Had a son with Aleydis, Rolekine, at age 28.
1379: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Ricmoden, at age 30.
1381: Lost son Ever when Ever was 8 years old.
1382: Had a son with Aleydis, Boidin, at age 33.
1384: Lost daughter Amelgeir when Amelgeir was 0 years old.
Aleydis gave birth to their stillborn daughter Amelgeir in 1384.
1388: Had a son with Aleydis, Herman, at age 39.
1391: Had a son with Aleydis, Hetselo, at age 42.
1393: Had a daughter with Aleydis, Siburgis, at age 44.
